masteryButtons.classDescription: Unrivaled in bow and blade, the rogue strikes out from the shadows to find a higher purpose for her deadly talents.
An artisan of shadows, they dash in and out of the reach of their enemies, each movement another deadly cut.
passiveBonuses: 15% more dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers)

masteryButtons.classDescription: A master of the bow, adept at engaging foes from a distance and keeping them there.
passiveBonuses: Using a bow attack grants 5% increased attack speed. Can stack 5 times. All stacks fall off after if you have not used a bow attack recently.
50% increased damage while using a bow

masteryButtons.classDescription: An Elder cresting his prime, the Mage wields the power of the arcane to make up for his past wrongs and to give the world a new future.
Unrivaled in bow and blade, the rogue strikes out from the shadows to find a higher purpose for her deadly talents.
An artisan of shadows, they dash in and out of the reach of their enemies, each movement another deadly cut.
passiveBonuses: 15% more dodge rating (multiplicative with other modifiers)

masteryButtons.classDescription: A master of the bow, adept at engaging foes from a distance and keeping them there.
passiveBonuses: Using a bow attack grants 5% increased attack speed. Can stack 5 times. All stacks fall off after if you have not used a bow attack recently.
50% increased damage while using a bow

masteryButtons.classDescription: An Elder cresting his prime, the Mage wields the power of the arcane to make up for his past wrongs and to give the world a new future.

nodeList.altText: Each point of Dexterity adds 4 dodge rating and improves skills that rely on the skillfull handling of weapons, such as Flurry and Shurikens.

nodeList.description: Your melee, throwing, and bow attacks have increased attack speed and deal additional physical damage.
You take less damage while moving (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have increased dodge rating.
You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping a sword or dagger in your off hand. You take more damage while dual wielding (multiplicative with other modifiers).

nodeList.altText: Haste increases movement speed by 30% and does not stack.
nodeList.description: You have a chance to gain {Haste} for one second on hit and deal increased damage based on your increased movement speed.

node.description: You take less damage while moving (multiplicative with other modifiers) and have increased dodge rating.

stats.statName: Increased Damage per 1% Increased Movement Speed

nodeList.description: You have additional dodge rating and a chance to receieve a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
Every third melee, throwing, or bow attack deals increased damage.

node.description: Your melee, throwing, and bow attacks have increased attack speed and deal additional physical damage.

nodeList.description: You have a chance to poison on hit while you have a dagger or bow equipped.
When you use a skill that costs zero mana and hit an enemy you regain health and mana.

node.description: You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping a sword or dagger in your off hand. You take more damage while dual wielding (multiplicative with other modifiers).

stats.statName: Increased Dodge Rating while Dual Wielding

nodeList.description: You have increased critical strike chance per sword, bow, or dagger you have equipped.

stats.statName: Increased Critical Strike Chance per Sword
Increased Critical Strike Chance per Dagger
Increased Critical Strike Chance with a Bow

nodeList.description: Every third non-channelling melee, throwing, or bow attack also inflicts bleed.

node.description: Every third melee, throwing, or bow attack deals increased damage.
Your melee, throwing, and bow attacks have increased attack speed and deal additional physical damage.

nodeList.description: When you use a melee or bow attack that costs mana it consumes additional mana to deal more damage (multiplicative)

node.description: When you use a skill that costs zero mana and hit an enemy you regain health and mana.

nodeList.description: You have additional health and whenever you receive a glancing blow you recover health.

node.description: You have additional dodge rating and a chance to receieve a {Glancing Blow} when hit.

nodeList.altText: Flow only triggers when you actively use a skill.
nodeList.description: Gain a stack of {Flow} whenever you use a unique skill. Using a fourth unique skill consumes all stacks causing the skill to deal greatly increased damage. Stacks fall off after 4 seconds of not using a new unique skill.
You have additional dexterity and you have a chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
When you create a shadow you regain health and skills used by shadows deal increased damage.
You deal additional physical damage with melee attacks and if you have been hit recently have additional dodge rating.
Generating a stack of {Flow} increases your melee and throwing attack speed for a short duration. This buff can stack.

node.altText: Flow only triggers when you actively use a skill.
node.description: Gain a stack of {Flow} whenever you use a unique skill. Using a fourth unique skill consumes all stacks causing the skill to deal greatly increased damage. Stacks fall off after 4 seconds of not using a new unique skill.

nodeList.description: You deal increased physical damage and have a chance to inflict bleed on hit with melee and throwing attacks.
You have additional health and you have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} when hit. Each stack of Dusk Shroud adds 50 dodge rating and 5% chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.

node.description: You have additional dexterity and you have a chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.

stats.statName: Chance to gain Dusk Shroud when hit

nodeList.description: {Flow} is consumed when you use a 5th unique skill rather than a 4th, but the skill that consumes flow has much higher critical strike chance and bleed chance.

node.description: Generating a stack of {Flow} increases your melee and throwing attack speed for a short duration. This buff can stack.

node.altText: Flow only triggers when you actively use a skill.
node.description: Gain a stack of {Flow} whenever you use a unique skill. Using a fourth unique skill consumes all stacks causing the skill to deal greatly increased damage. Stacks fall off after 4 seconds of not using a new unique skill.

stats.statName: Unique Skills Required to Consume Flow

nodeList.description: You have increased melee attack speed. When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud}. Each stack of Dusk Shroud adds 50 dodge rating and 5% chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.

node.description: You have additional health and you have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} when hit. Each stack of Dusk Shroud adds 50 dodge rating and 5% chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
You have additional dexterity and you have a chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.

stats.statName: Chance to gain Dusk Shroud when hit

nodeList.description: Skills that generate or consume {Flow} deal increased melee damage and have additional melee critical strike multiplier.

node.description: Generating a stack of {Flow} increases your melee and throwing attack speed for a short duration. This buff can stack.

node.altText: Flow only triggers when you actively use a skill.
node.description: Gain a stack of {Flow} whenever you use a unique skill. Using a fourth unique skill consumes all stacks causing the skill to deal greatly increased damage. Stacks fall off after 4 seconds of not using a new unique skill.

stats.statName: Increased Melee Damage when Generating or Consuming Flow
Melee Crit Multiplier when Generating or Consuming Flow

nodeList.description: When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you have a chance to gain a stack of {Crimson Shroud} for 4 seconds. Crimson Shroud grants chance to bleed on hit and less damage over time taken (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.description: You deal increased physical damage and have a chance to inflict bleed on hit with melee and throwing attacks.

stats.statName: Bleed Chance per Stack of Crimson Shroud
Damage over Time Taken per Stack of Crimson Shroud

nodeList.altText:
Does not prevent dodging with {Silver Shroud}.
Glancing Blows deal 35% less damage.
nodeList.description: Your dodge chance is added as twice as much chance to receive a glancing blow, but you cannot dodge.

node.description: You have additional health and you have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} when hit. Each stack of Dusk Shroud adds 50 dodge rating and 5% chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.
You have additional dexterity and you have a chance to receive a {Glancing Blow} when hit.

stats.statName: Chance to gain Dusk Shroud when hit
Increased Melee Attack Speed while Dual Wielding

nodeList.description: You leech a portion of melee damage as health and your health leech is applied faster.

stats.statName: Increased Damage while at full health

nodeList.description: You gain a bonus while dual wielding depending on your weapon combination.

stats.statName: Increased Melee Attack Speed while Dual Wielding
Increased Crit Chance with a Sword and Dagger
Bleed Chance with an Axe and a Sword
Physical Damage Leeched as Health with an Axe and Dagger
Increased Stun Duration with a Mace and Sword
Frailty Chance with a Mace and Dagger

nodeList.altText: Ward is an overshield shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.
nodeList.description:
When you drop below 70% health you gain stacks of {Silver Shroud}. Silver Shroud is a buff that gives you 100% chance to dodge the next hit. Dodging a hit with Silver Shroud consumes all stacks, granting you 100 ward per stack.

This node's effect has a 15 second cooldown, but the cooldown does not prevent you from gaining Silver Shroud from other sources.

stats.statName: Stacks of Silver Shroud when you drop below high health

nodeList.description: When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Perfection. When you receive a hit you lose all stacks. Each stack of perfection increases your damage.

stats.statName: Increased Damage while at full health
Increased Damage per Stack of Perfection

nodeList.altText: Shrouds include {Dusk Shroud}, {Crimson Shroud}, and {Silver Shroud}.
nodeList.description: When you kill an enemy or hit a rare or boss enemy, you regain health for each stack of any Shroud on you.

stats.statName: Health Gained per Stack of Shroud

nodeList.nodeDescription: Each stack of Perfection grants [10] dodge rating and armour

node.description: When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Perfection. When you receive a hit you lose all stacks. Each stack of perfection increases your damage.

stats.statName: Increased Damage while at full health
Increased Damage per Stack of Perfection
Dodge Rating per Stack of Perfection
Damage Taken while at low health
Critical Chance while at low health

nodeList.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
nodeList.description: Your hits have a chance to shred armour and armour shred you apply is more effective.

stats.statName: Less Damage Dealt by Non-critical Hits

nodeList.altText: You can have a maximum of 3 shadows at once by default.
nodeList.description: You can have an additional shadow. Skills used by shadows deal increased damage.

nodeList.nodeDescription: [10%] increased damage on full health. Gain double stacks of Perfection on full health

node.nodeDescription: Each stack of Perfection grants [10] dodge rating and armour

node.description: When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Perfection. When you receive a hit you lose all stacks. Each stack of perfection increases your damage.

stats.statName: Increased Damage while at full health
Increased Damage per Stack of Perfection
Dodge Rating per Stack of Perfection
2 Stacks of Perfection per Melee Attack at Full Health

nodeList.description: You have additional Dexterity and when you hit a boss or rare enemy you reduce its dodge rating for 8 seconds.
You have increased bow attack speed and when you use a bow attack and hit at least one enemy you regain health.
By default you have {Concentration}, which increases your damage. If you are hit by an enemy within 4m you lose concentration for 4 seconds. Subsequent hits do not reset the cooldown.

nodeList.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
nodeList.description: You have increased bow and throwing attack damage and you have a chance to shred armour on hit.

If you have a bow equipped you gain 1 {Elemental Arrow} per second while moving, up to a maximum of 3. Using a bow attack expends an Elemental Arrow to deal additional bow fire damage and bow lightning damage.

nodeList.altText: Critical Vulnerability is a stacking ailment that adds a 5% additional chance to be crit and reduces critical strike avoidance by 10%.
nodeList.description: You have a chance to inflict Critical Vulnerability on hit.
You take less damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers). While wielding a bow you deal increased damage over time.

stats.statName: Damage Over Time while wielding a Bow

nodeList.description: You deal increased bow damage and gain {Elemental Arrows} more frequently.

node.description: If you have a bow equipped you gain 1 {Elemental Arrow} per second while moving, up to a maximum of 3. Using a bow attack expends an Elemental Arrow to deal additional bow fire damage and bow lightning damage.
By default you have {Concentration}, which increases your damage. If you are hit by an enemy within 4m you lose concentration for 4 seconds. Subsequent hits do not reset the cooldown.

nodeList.description: You can hold additional {Elemental Arrows} and you have additional elemental resistance for each arrow you are currently holding.

node.description: If you have a bow equipped you gain 1 {Elemental Arrow} per second while moving, up to a maximum of 3. Using a bow attack expends an Elemental Arrow to deal additional bow fire damage and bow lightning damage.

nodeList.description: You have a chance to avoid critical strikes and your critical strikes with bow attacks deal more damage.

node.altText: Critical Vulnerability is a stacking ailment that adds a 5% additional chance to be crit and reduces critical strike avoidance by 10%.
node.description: You have a chance to inflict Critical Vulnerability on hit.
By default you have {Concentration}, which increases your damage. If you are hit by an enemy within 4m you lose concentration for 4 seconds. Subsequent hits do not reset the cooldown.

nodeList.description: You can consume [1] additional {Elemental Arrow} with each bow attack. If you consume 3 arrows with a single attack it has 200% additional shock and ignite chance

node.description: You deal increased bow damage and gain {Elemental Arrows} more frequently.

If you have a bow equipped you gain 1 {Elemental Arrow} per second while moving, up to a maximum of 3. Using a bow attack expends an Elemental Arrow to deal additional bow fire damage and bow lightning damage.

stats.statName: Elemental Arrow consumed per bow attack
Shock and Ignite chance when consuming 3 Arrows

nodeList.description: When you use a bow attack you gain {Arrow Storm} which increases your bow attack speed for 3 seconds. You can only gain Arrow Storm once every 10 seconds.

stats.statName: Increased Bow Attack Speed with Arrow Storm
Chance to inflict Bleed on Bow Hit

nodeList.description: Non-elemental bow attacks cannot consume {Elemental Arrows}, but instead generate an Elemental Arrow on use. Consuming an Elemental Arrow also increases the elemental damage of the attack that consumes them.

stats.statName: Increased Elemental Damage with Elemental Arrow
Non-Elemental Bow Attacks Generate Elemental Arrows
Only Elemental Bow Attacks Consume Elemental Arrows

nodeList.description: Chance to gain a stack of Sharpshooter when you hit an enemy based on your how far you are from that enemy, up to a maximum at 10m. Each stack of Sharpshooter increases bow damage and lasts 8 seconds.

nodeList.altText: Ward is an overshield shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.
nodeList.description: When you proc {Arrowstorm} you gain stacks of {Silver Shroud}. Silver Shroud is a buff that gives you 100% chance to dodge the next hit. Dodging a hit with Silver Shroud consumes all stacks, granting you 100 ward per stack.

node.description: When you use a bow attack you gain {Arrow Storm} which increases your bow attack speed for 3 seconds. You can only gain Arrow Storm once every 10 seconds.

stats.statName: Increased Bow Attack Speed with Arrow Storm
Increased damage taken from nearby enemies

nodeList.description: You have additional poison penetration and bow attacks have additional chance to poison on hit.

nodeList.altText: Bow Mastery still increases bow attack speed
nodeList.description: Adds {Barrage of Pain} to your Marksman Passive, Bow Mastery. You gain a stack and refresh all existing stacks of Bow Mastery by using a bow attack and hitting at least one enemy.
You have increased mana and mana regen and your bow attacks deal increased damage equal to a portion of their mana cost.

nodeList.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
nodeList.description: Each stack of Sharpshooter also increases stun chance and adds a chance to shred armour on hit

node.description: Chance to gain a stack of Sharpshooter when you hit an enemy based on your how far you are from that enemy, up to a maximum at 10m. Each stack of Sharpshooter increases bow damage and lasts 8 seconds.

stats.statName: Increased Stun Chance per stack of Sharpshooter
Armour Shred Chance per stack of Sharpshooter

nodeList.altText: Rain of Arrows is unrelated to the active skill Hail of Arrows and is not affected by its tree.
nodeList.description: Adds a chance to cause a {Rain of Arrows} to descend upon your target when you proc {Arrow Storm}. Rain of Arrows is a physical bow attack that hits all enemies in an area around the target.

node.altText: Ward is an overshield shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.
node.description: When you proc {Arrowstorm} you gain stacks of {Silver Shroud}. Silver Shroud is a buff that gives you 100% chance to dodge the next hit. Dodging a hit with Silver Shroud consumes all stacks, granting you 100 ward per stack.
When you use a bow attack you gain {Arrow Storm} which increases your bow attack speed for 3 seconds. You can only gain Arrow Storm once every 10 seconds.

stats.statName: Increased Bow Attack Speed with Arrow Storm

nodeList.description: When you use a skill that costs zero mana and hit an enemy you regain mana, but bow attacks cost more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [15%] increased bow mana cost. If you use a 0 cost attack and hit at least 1 enemy you regain [3] mana

node.description: You have increased mana and mana regen and your bow attacks deal increased damage equal to a portion of their mana cost.

nodeList.description: Each stack of Bow Mastery with {Barrage of Pain} also grants additional critical strike multiplier and health gained on crit.

node.altText: Bow Mastery still increases bow attack speed
node.description: Adds {Barrage of Pain} to your Marksman Passive, Bow Mastery. You gain a stack and refresh all existing stacks of Bow Mastery by using a bow attack and hitting at least one enemy.

nodeList.nodeDescription: +[2] arrows with multi shot. [20%] increased area with detonating arrow and Hail of Arrows. (2 points allocable)

node.description: You have increased mana and mana regen and your bow attacks deal increased damage equal to a portion of their mana cost.

nodeList.description: You have a increased mana regen and your melee hits have a chance to inflict {Frailty}. Frailty reduces damage dealt by 6% and stacks up to 3 times.

GeneralTooltop.body: You must have this many points in your Base Class to put points into any Mastery Class. Reaching this point does not unlock your Mastery Classes
GeneralTooltop.title: Mastery Threshold
